pattern.name: Footer bar
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: Users need to know the conditions under which they can use a site
pattern.context: The site contains material that is copyrighted or keeps personal data of customers.
pattern.pattlet: Add a footer bar with links to the conditions of use.
pattern.solution: The conditions of use may include a link to a copyright statement, disclaimers, privacy statements and other legal matters. The footer bar is also often combined with a or other types of navigation that may come in handy. A footer bar is appropriate on any page of the site and should therefore become a standard element of all page templates.
